title: Farmer Client Site
description: A client-side web application for farmers to manage their produce, connect with buyers, and track orders in real-time.
highlights: Responsive design for mobile and desktop

title: 3D Model Viewer
description: A web application to view and interact with 3D models in real-time. Users can rotate, zoom, and explore 3D objects seamlessly in the browser.
highlights: Optimized for desktop and mobile screens
Built with Three.js for real-time rendering

title: ToyTopia – Kids Toy Store
description: A modern toy store web app built with React and Firebase. Users can browse toys by category, view details, and manage their own products securely.
highlights: Add, Update, and Delete toys with secure access

title: Forever Project
description: A personal portfolio and service showcase platform — users can explore projects, services, and contact details with smooth navigation and responsive design.
highlights: Responsive layout for all screen sizes

title: Shoese Project
description: A modern e-commerce platform for shoes — users can browse, search, filter by category, view product details, and manage their cart seamlessly.
highlights: Product detail pages with dynamic routing
Responsive layout for mobile and desktop
